docs.snippet: ST. PETERSBURG, Nov. 23. -- Memorial services for the late Emperor and Dowager Empress of China were held at the Chinese Legation here to-day. Ambassador Riddle and the Secretaries of the American Embassy were among those present.
docs.lead_paragraph: ST. PETERSBURG, Nov. 23. -- Memorial services for the late Emperor and Dowager Empress of China were held at the Chinese Legation here to-day. Ambassador Riddle and the Secretaries of the American Embassy were among those present.
docs.abstract: Hammerstein signs tenor F Constantino to 5-yr contract

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 3. -- Mail-carrying railroads in the country have had a large sum cut from their income as a result of the discovery last year of the peculiar method of computing their earnings which had obtained for many years. This method was to...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 3. -- Mail-carrying railroads in the country have had a large sum cut from their income as a result of the discovery last year of the peculiar method of computing their earnings which had obtained for many years. This method was to weigh mails on roads every day for a certain period and divide the aggregate by six working days in order to obtain the daily average.

headline.main: MILLIONS FOR GOVERNMENT.; Railroads Deprived of Large Revenue Gained from the Mails.
